com.devwebsphere.manualpartition.data
Class PartitionMapping

java.lang.Object
  com.devwebsphere.manualpartition.data.PartitionMapping
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class PartitionMapping
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

This class is used as the value for the PartitionMap map. It's linked to a database table using the WXS JPALoader.

Author:
bnewport
